description: Three storey extension to side of existing house to form a 2-bedroom terraced residential unit; re-alignment of boundary wall; vehicle access; associated external works.
decision_conditions: The proposed extension, by reason of size, scale and siting, would be harmful to the street scene and to the visual character of the area, pattern of development of development in the area contrary to Council's Adopted UDP policy 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9. | The proposal represents an undesirable overdevelopment of the site which would result in a cramped development harmful to the living conditions of current occupiers of 81 Almond Avenue and future occupiers of the site contrary to Council's Adopted UDP policies 4.1, 5.1 and 5.5 and Supplementary Planning Guidance 13 and 14.
